Class ValueHistory

    • java.awt.Component

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class ValueHistory
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    Displays history of sensor's values in graphs. Uses JFreeChart library.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ValueHistory

        public ValueHistory(Sensor sensor)
        Gets values from Sensor given as parameter. For valid ones (not boolean) creates graph. Also creates dialog button listeners.
        Parameters:
        sensor - containing values to be displayed
